attributes.action: Call an election NOW to let the people show their opinions of MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public have clearly shown they have no faith in the currently standing politicians of all parties, and therefore in order that democracy be served, the Prime Minister should call an immediate election to allow the people of the United Kingdom to express their vote. Failing that The Queen should dissolve Parliment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
